RT @McGovernMA We need a president who will take bold action to save our planet from the climate crisis. 

Once again, @ewarren has a plan for that. https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1204400467222114304 QT @ewarren We need a #GreenNewDeal to fight the climate crisis—and we need a #BlueNewDeal to protect and restore our oceans so they are a part of our climate solution, and so we can rebuild our blue economy. Read my plan for a #BlueNewDeal: https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/blue-new-deal?source=soc-WB-ew-tw-rollout-20191210

Thank you @JerseyCityPD, first responders & all law enforcement officers who showed bravery today. My prayers are w/ the victims of this tragedy. Now, let’s continue the investigation, honor Det. Seals’ sacrifice, pray for the injured officers, & work to end gun violence.

Great to see @NOAA launch the Mission: Iconic Reefs project to restore nearly 3 million sq. ft. of the #Florida Reef Tract.
 
Passing my Restoring Resilient Reefs Act would bolster this effort & provide federal funding to conserve our nation's reefs.
https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/2019/8/rubio-schatz-scott-hirono-introduce-bill-to-restore-and-conserve-america-s-coral-reefs https://twitter.com/sanctuaries/status/1204082503130046464 QT @sanctuaries The coral reefs within @FloridaKeysNMS have been damaged by hurricanes, bleaching, disease, and heavy human use. Today, we and our partners are launching Mission: Iconic Reefs, one of the largest investments in coral reef restoration worldwide: https://sanctuaries.noaa.gov/news/dec19/noaa-launches-mission-iconic-reefs-to-save-florida-keys-coral-reefs.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ELXCpxXU4AAbLPM.jpg

It's no great secret Trump's FCC is a friend to corporate interests. That's why it set out to destroy a free and open internet. 

Mitch McConnell: make your case against net neutrality to the American people. But do not block the Senate from voting on the Save The Internet Act. https://twitter.com/RepRashida/status/1204443640090812416 QT @RepRashida It has been two years since @POTUS and @FCC repealed #NetNeutrality rules and almost 250 days since the House voted to restore it.
 
Today, I am standing with @SenateDems in demanding @senatemajldr stop blocking a vote on the #SaveTheInternet Act! 

Here's why: http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/ELcLGizWwAEeJ-w.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/ELcLGizWwAEeJ-w.mp4

Puppies aren’t separated from their moms until ~8 weeks. Less than that is thought of as harmful or abusive.

One of the most common lengths of US paid family leave is ~6 weeks.

So yes, when we “let the market decide”on parental leave, “the market” treats people worse than dogs. https://twitter.com/newsweek/status/1204496023172730881 QT @Newsweek .@AOC slams U.S. policy on paid family leave, says dogs get more time with their puppies than mothers with newborn babies https://www.newsweek.com/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-slams-united-states-paid-family-leave-1476557?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=Social&utm_campaign=NewsweekTwitter

275 of those bills are bipartisan.

RT @AveriHarper John Weigel was at a Sanders town hall in September and told the crowd he was contemplating suicide after being saddled with medical debt to treat Huntington’s disease. Today, he and @BernieSanders reunited: https://twitter.com/berniesanders/status/1204148636579483654 QT @BernieSanders When I met John, a veteran, a few months ago, he had $139,000 in medical debt.

Thankfully today he is doing much better.

We must eliminate all medical debt—and when our veterans come home, they must receive the best quality health care this country can provide them. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1204147477282217990/img/EGMKNGrTCgc5Jiwo.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1204147477282217990/vid/480x270/NSzBGR_rjwCk34ZM.mp4?tag=13

Children are dying in CBP custody due to the flu. Refusing to administer flu vaccines is neglectful and cruel. I'll end the unnecessary detention of children and families—and enforce strict standards for medical care for anyone in our care. https://twitter.com/fams2gether/status/1204132707145531393 QT @fams2gether We are outside the Chula Vista border patrol station with @Doc4CampClosure and @NeverAgainActn demanding to be let in to vaccinate the kids inside. #CloseTheCamps #FluVaccines4Migrants [Thread] http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1204132651407425542/pu/img/0BfXvEFvYEn_BWrb.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1204132651407425542/pu/vid/476x270/PomAk5EZzk-hf657.mp4?tag=10

I first met John a few months ago, in what was not a good circumstance for him. I’m glad he is doing much better today. We are going to take care of the people who have served this country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ELeSbkmWwAAArI3.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1204584646031368192/vid/320x320/oT5l6OZgQ5QjfKkV.mp4?tag=13
